a. Holding period level (in days) of Trade Receivables is calculated by dividing trade receivables by revenue from operations multiplied by number of days in the year/period.

b. Holding period level (in days) of Inventory is calculated by dividing Total inventory by sum of Cost of materials consumed, Purchases of stock-in-trade and Changes in inventory multiplied by number of days in the year/period.
c. Holding period level (in days) of Trade Payables is calculated by dividing trade payables by purchase of raw material multiplied by number of days in the year/period.
## Assumption on working capital requirement& Justification for holding period:
